original_text: Then the brothers immediately sent Paul off on his way to the sea, but Silas and Timothy remained there.
korean_text: 형제들이 곧 바울을 내보내어 바다까지 가게 하되 실라와 디모데는 아직 거기 머물더라

sentences.original_text: Then the brothers immediately sent Paul off on his way to the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 형제들은 즉시 바울을 바다로 떠나보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: but Silas and Timothy remained there.
